Text: Hi sujaidr... never seen swingers..looks good though..so yes i'll do it....blow out is good too ....i have rocky horror bluray on my pc...i'll encode it next couple of days.....the 4.5GB bluray of dirty dancing looked rubbish when i encoded it so im currently downloading the 10GB 1080p bluray so i can get it right....so its a green light for all these :)

I can watch your movies once I download them to my laptop, but when I copy them via DivX to a Dvd and then try to watch them on my dvd player, I get the message 'Video codec not supported' Can you help me, as I have no idea which Video Codec I need to download. Thanks for the movies. They are clear and have good sound!
Regards. Elaine

@Elaine1951 Download "DivX Plus Converter" or "DivX Author" if you want to convert .mp4 videos to .divx file that should play on your DVD player.  That's what I use to convert videos to play on my Philips DVD Player.  Search YouTube if you want them for free.
